snippet: The United States has lost its effort to win the return of George Wright, who escaped a New Jersey prison in 1970 and hijacked a jetliner for ransom two years later.
abstract: Portugal will not extradite American fugitive George Wright, convicted murderer and hijacker who escaped from a New Jersey prison in 1970; Portuegese officials pronounce the case officially over, saying the US has exhausted every appeal in its legal system.
lead_paragraph: The United States has lost its effort to win the return of George Wright, who escaped a New Jersey prison in 1970 and hijacked a jetliner for ransom two years later.

headline.seo: George Wright, Fugitive U.S. Killer, Avoids Extradition From Portugal
headline.main: Deadline Past, Portugal Says It Won’t Send Killer to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Deadline Past, Portugal Says It Won’t Send Killer to U.S.
